1370: Thomas was born in Muurhuysen1 in 1370.
Got married to Segherarden at age 21 in 1370.
Had a son with Segherarden, Godefridus, at age 21.
1372: Had a son with Segherarden, Woutersoet, at age 23.
1373: Had a son with Segherarden, Poppo, at age 24.
1376: Had a son with Segherarden, Laurens, at age 27.
1378: Had a daughter with Segherarden, Sybillia, at age 29.
1380: Had a daughter with Segherarden, Rycaldis, at age 31.
1381: Had a son with Segherarden, Kornillis, at age 32.
1385: Had a daughter with Segherarden, Wendelmodis, at age 36.
1386: Had a son with Segherarden, Woutermanne, at age 37.
1387: Lost son Woutermanne when Woutermanne was 2 years old.
1388: Lost daughter Wendelmodis when Wendelmodis was 4 years old.
1390: Lost daughter Rycaldis when Rycaldis was 11 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
